text: @RWPUSA @TomLevenson Indeed, the 20,000 American Covid-19 dead so far no longer have an option to be even tired of such "winning".  Trump's dad divided the world into the rich genius Killers & the poor Losers.  Donald's managed to combine the two, a Loser of a President and a Killer of the People.
